_.name: MageFlowConnector
_.summary: MageFlow Connector integrates a Magento instance with MageFlow.
_.description: MageFlow is an essential tool for every Magento development team. MageFlow Connector integrates a Magento instance to MageFlow REST API.
_.notes:
0.1.0 This is a pre-beta release. 0.3.0 Almost beta quality release. 0.3.1 Packaging fix 0.3.2 Added missing jQuery map file 0.3.3 Bugfix in company data 0.3.4 Added MFx tag to frontend HTML 0.4.0 More entities fixed, website packed 0.4.1 oauth setup shell script, API data format update 0.4.2 Fixed Advanced Maintenance mode. It can be switched from the backend and via API. 0.4.3 Fixed bug in setup scripts that prevented installation 0.5.0 Beta release of MFx 0.5.1 Fixes in API resources, fixed rollback 0.5.2 Added cache cleaning before creating OAuth user 0.5.3 Changes in system/info format 0.6.0 Lot of fixes, change in system/log format, caching 0.6.1 ** Bug * [MFX-1] - Head.php invalid argument Warning in the logs * [MFX-2] - Fatal error in HtmlRenderer * [MFX-4] - Wrong password reset link in the e-mail sent by MFx 0.6.2 Packaging fix 0.6.3 - ** Bug * [MFX-6] - create_backend_user script is linked from wrong place 0.7.0 ** Bug * [MFX-5] - Error when trying to send cahngeset from pushgrid ** Task * [MFX-7] - Review all logging and make it use log levels 0.7.1 Bug [MFX-9] - catalog/attribute and catalog/attributeset return empty list [MFX-11] - Root category not mapped properly when website is migrated [MFX-12] - After migrating websites form M1 to M2 there is an empty store and store view row 0.7.2 bugfixes 0.7.3 ** Bug * [MFX-17] - Generate initial GUID for Magento' root category 0.7.4 0.7.5 ** Improvement * [MFX-8] - Send Project id when Pull grid asks for Changesets 0.7.6 0.7.7 ** Bug * [MFX-22] - Grid ordering doesn't work and default ordering should be by time descending * [MFX-23] - Grid filter on preview field breaks Magento 0.7.8 Various bugs 0.7.9 ** Story * [MFX-29] - As API User I want to make request to ping resource to check API status 0.7.10 * [MFX-16] - Admin user changeset data is invalid * [MFX-30] - Automatic login from MF not working in test 0.7.11 ** Task * [MFX-33] - Add SSL peer verification to Oauth client 0.8.0 ** Bug * [MFX-24] - Remove commented code * [MFX-25] - Modify MageFlow API settings view * [MFX-26] - Fix license URL to http://mageflow.com/license/connector/eula.txt * [MFX-27] - Fix docblock * [MFX-28] - Fix license URL to http://mageflow.com/license/connector/eula.txt * [MFX-34] - Fix oauth setup API resource URL
** Improvement * [MFX-31] - Refactor this method body to a separate model
0.8.1 ** Bug * [MFX-35] - Fix api resource & field names when authenticating MF-login Release Notes - Magento Connector - Version 0.8.2 ** Bug * [MFX-37] - create_oauth_consumer.php does not exit with proper exit code
0.8.3 * refactoring and bugfixes in connection dialog
0.9.0 ** Bug * [MFX-39] - Packing and transfering of catalog/attributeset does not work properly * [MFX-40] - Too much log kills Magento (memory, print_r)
0.9.1 ** Bug * [MFX-42] - Missing class file for Helper/Handler/System/User * [MFX-43] - Call to undefined method Mageflow_Connect_Helper_Handler_System_User::systemUserHandler() in /srv/vhosts/v2c0w.test.mageflow.net/public/app/code/community/Mageflow/Connect/Model/Api2/System/User/Rest/Admin/V1.php on line 108 * [MFX-44] - Role info is not read when admin user changeset is imported to receving instance
0.9.2 ** Bug * [MFX-47] - Magento WYSIWYG file model absolute URL is wrong ** New Feature * [MFX-45] - Create Media Index and perform initial media indexing
0.9.3 ** Bug * [MFX-48] - Wrong entity entity handlers in pullAction and applyAction ** New Feature * [MFX-46] - Add API resource that would handle cms media 1.0.0 Official stable release.
1.0.1 ** Bug * [MFX-50] - PHP 5.3 compatibility issue
1.0.2 ** Bug * [MFX-52] - AttributeSet cannot be migrated
1.0.3 ** Bug * [MFX-53] - White page after saving system config
1.0.4 ** Bug * [MFX-54] - Attribute set preview (name) is empty in the push grid
1.0.5 * MFX is now installed via Magento Connect automatically
1.0.6 Change base url bugfix
1.1.0 ** Bug * [MFX-13] - Category mapping in changeset item is invalid * [MFX-38] - Empty project name * [MFX-51] - Undefined indexes ** Task * [MFX-57] - Implement "Connect to MageFlow"
1.2.2
** Bug * [MFX-61] - Product PUT response does not contain entities * [MFX-62] - Product POST does not work * [MFX-63] - Website resource response does not contain website MFGUIDs * [MFX-64] - Product resource category IDS are integers instead of category MFGUIDs * [MFX-65] - Product stock_data is not PUT or POSTed correctly * [MFX-115] - Attributes are also created as changesetitems when attribute set is saved * [MFX-116] - Creation of new attribute set failed * [MFX-117] - Website is missing MF GUID in the Push grid * [MFX-118] - Attribute set is missing MF GUID * [MFX-119] - JS dialog with "description" is displayed in case "Discard" is selected * [MFX-122] - System configuration change is not pulled correctly * [MFX-124] - Admin Role changeset was not pulled * [MFX-125] - Items are sorted randomly in Pull grid * [MFX-127] - Admin user was not pulled correctly * [MFX-129] - Table names hardcoded in update script * [MFX-134] - Admin User is pulled without assigned Role * [MFX-135] - Admin role resources not packed correctly * [MFX-136] - Rename "Push changes" to "Local Change Items" * [MFX-137] - Rename "Pull changes" to "Remote Change Items" * [MFX-138] - Rename "Refresh changeset cache" to "Refresh Remote Change Items"
** Improvement * [MFX-66] - Display project and instance info in the backend under Test API * [MFX-113] - Add MF_GUID column to push grid * [MFX-126] - Create Pull grid caching * [MFX-131] - Password could be added as a parameter to cmd line user creation script * [MFX-132] - Add instance key to instance connect URL as parameter
** Story * [MFX-139] - I want to see "Created by" in the Remote Change Items grid
** Task * [MFX-60] - Fix base_url type * [MFX-133] - Add "Monitor this instance" button with on/off options to MFX configuration view
1.2.3
Minor bugs
1.2.4
** Improvement * [MFX-142] - I want to see (at least) Connection status in the Connect to MageFlow tab automatically after connecting
1.2.5 ** Bug * [MFX-147] - Replace "Error" with "Disconnected" in connection status view
** Task * [MFX-149] - Post notification about connection status to admin notification feed
1.2.6
** Bug * [MFX-152] - Reorder Mageflow Connect menu under System->Configuration * [MFX-153] - Attribute migration fails
** Task * [MFX-150] - Fix Remote Change Items grid columns
1.2.7
** Task * [MFX-155] - Automatically create admin user with user's MageFlow e-mail to make automatic admin login work
1.2.8
** Bug * [MFX-156] - Fix mass Pull - checking items not working after cache refresh, wrong id-s used when pulling
1.2.9
** Bug * [MFX-162] - MFX not PHP 5.3 compatible
1.2.10
** Bug * [MFX-161] - Changed Product migration from MF to Magento fails.
1.2.11
** Bug * [MFX-159] - Changing entity "Store" in source Instance and pushing it into target Instance generates a new entity instead changing it.
** Improvement * [MFX-164] - Pass instance key as parameter to changesetitem request
1.2.12
** Bug * [MFX-165] - Redirect broken in production
Release Notes - Magento Connector - Version 1.2.13
** Bug * [MFX-166] - Duplicate headers sent in some cases
1.2.14
** Bug * [MFX-170] - Pushing changeset item from Magento Push grid to MF, but trying to cancel it from description dialog box - it sends item to MF anyway. * [MFX-173] - I want Demo Instances to have "demo" as type in default config
1.3.0
** Bug * [MFX-157] - Displaying system log does not work * [MFX-172] - "failed to receive data from locale en_US"
** Improvement * [MFX-163] - Remove jQuery dependency
** Story * [MFX-140] - As a User I want to be able to migrate transactional e-mail templates
** Task * [MFX-56] - Fix change_base_url * [MFX-174] - Add getLastAccessTime() to default helper * [MFX-175] - Add new API resource system/last_access_time * [MFX-176] - Code review: PHP 5.3 compatibility
1.3.1
** Story * [MFX-177] - Review and refactor changeset recovery process
1.3.2
** Bug * [MFX-179] - Pull items not applied * [MFX-180] - Sorting pull grid messes up layout * [MFX-182] - Bug in the category migration * [MFX-185] - Category relocation does not create changeset * [MFX-190] - Attribute Default Value does not migrate. * [MFX-192] - Entity "Website" push from MageFlow to Magento fails
** Improvement * [MFX-186] - Add missing unit tests for the Observer * [MFX-188] - Add interface for items that must have getMfGuid() method
** Task * [MFX-181] - Add content item MFGUID to change item metainfo
1.3.3
** Bug * [MFX-200] - E-mail template does not get MFGUID column by upgrade scripts
** Improvement * [MFX-198] - Consolidate setup scripts
** Task * [MFX-199] - Add SQL script to remove all MageFlow tables and columns from database
1.3.4
** Bug * [MFX-201] - User can not access newly created demo instance * [MFX-202] - User can not establish connection from Magento into MF.
1.3.5
** Bug * [MFX-206] - Undefined variable breaks installation from command line
1.3.6
** Bug * [MFX-205] - An error occurs pushing changeset first time from newly created Magento instance - it does not ask for description. * [MFX-225] - Admin role ACL not packed upon first save * [MFX-226] - User's role is not packed into change item * [MFX-232] - Can not migrate category created by user * [MFX-240] - Simple products with custom option pushes not working
** Story * [MFX-208] - As a User I want to reindex all or selected value objects of supported entity types
** Task * [MFX-214] - Add instance type parameter to connect dialog redirect URL
1.3.7
** Task * [MFX-245] - Ground rules link to Magento push and pull grid
1.3.8
** Bug * [MFX-247] - Ground Rules URL is broken
1.4.0
** Task * [MFX-252] - Add API resource newsletter/template * [MFX-253] - Add API resource cms/widget * [MFX-254] - Add API resource customer/group * [MFX-256] - Add API resource sales/tax/class/product * [MFX-259] - Add API resource system/design * [MFX-263] - Add API resource cms/poll * [MFX-264] - Add API resource system/orderstatus
1.4.1
** Bug * [MFX-282] - Classloader problem in Windows (WAMP) * [MFX-283] - sys_getloadavg called in Win
1.4.2
** Task * [MFX-260] - Add API resource promotion/rule/catalog * [MFX-261] - Add API resource promotion/rule/checkout * [MFX-286] - Add API resource sales/termsandconditions * [MFX-287] - Add API resource catalog/searchterms * [MFX-289] - As a System I want a way to disable creating changeset from currently saved item
1.4.3
Repackaging of 1.4.2 with all dependencies
1.4.4
** Bug * [MFX-291] - mf_guid is not migrated correctly for stores/views
1.4.5
** Bug * [MFX-294] - Fix mapping of Attributeset id to mf_guid
1.4.6
** Bug * [MFX-238] - Some of the updates intermittently are not getting pulled * [MFX-279] - Logging switch does not work * [MFX-295] - Fix mapping of Tax Class id<->mf_guid for Product
1.4.7
** Bug * [MFX-301] - Refactor MFX, widget button should not be rewritten
1.4.8
** Bug * [MFX-308] - getSettingValue() returns default values only * [MFX-316] - Product status changed to "disabled" by migration * [MFX-325] - MF GUID is not displayed properly in Pull Grid * [MFX-326] - MFX calls beginTransaction() during Magento installation
** Improvement * [MFX-195] - Improve saving of initial configuration, compare against defaults
** New Feature * [MFX-304] - Make cleaning cache optional
** Task * [MFX-307] - Make API URL configurable in Magento admin * [MFX-309] - Refactor custom URL-s into standard default/* structure in config.xml * [MFX-318] - Prevent secret keys from being logged * [MFX-324] - Make automatic truncating of pull grid cache configurable
1.4.9
** Bug * [MFX-296] - Migrate multi-store data with Product * [MFX-298] - Conf Products meta info specified for certain store view cannot be migrated * [MFX-317] - System Configuration item scope_id is changed to 0 by migration * [MFX-332] - Product prices not synced correctly * [MFX-333] - Store level / localized translations not migrated * [MFX-335] - Product attributes not migrated properly on store view level * [MFX-337] - Problem with custom attributes and attribute sets * [MFX-339] - tableExists bug in setup script * [MFX-340] - Admin user account is locked up after connecting to MageFlow API if MF and mageflow usernames match
1.5.0
** Task * [MFX-346] - Update Push grid to configurable tabbed interface
** Bug * [MFX-347] - Rework MFX Push grids back to non-ajax, leaving ajax options possible
** Improvement * [MFX-348] - Observer must save only enabled types
1.5.1
** Bug * [MFX-349] - CMS data types NOT saved if OTHER is disabled * [MFX-350] - Push grid reset messes up layout (loads double view) * [MFX-351] - CMS Node saving not supported in 1.5.0 * [MFX-357] - MFX does not show description window on migration.
1.5.2

1.6.0
